name: mopping_start
description: This function is used to initiate mop cleaning with a robot vacuum around designated rooms or objects.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to initiate mop cleaning.

parameters.name: rvcLocations
parameters.description: The locations around which the robot vacuum should perform mop cleaning.

parameters.name: rvcObjects
parameters.description: The objects around which the robot vacuum should perform mop cleaning.
